author: dws
msg: * www/project_faq.html: Fix typo.
Patch by: Eric Hanchrow <offby1@blarg.net>

author: kfogel
msg: * tools/dev/datecheck.py: New script.  This was originally at
http://svn.collab.net/repos/cvs2svn/trunk/datecheck.py, but its
new canonical location is here.

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r10148: Don't bother to create tempfiles for empty stdin,
just pass null stdin instead.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/hooks.c
(run_hook_cmd): Document that 'stdin_handle' parameter can be null.
(svn_repos__hooks_pre_revprop_change,
svn_repos__hooks_post_revprop_change): Adjust to use null
stdin_handle if new_value / old_value is null.

author: jpieper
msg: Partial fix for Issue #1902: During updates, if a WC path is missing
do not immediately error, instead report it as missing in the parent
directory.  This allows one to update a single file or directory that
has been added in a more recent revision than the working copy.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c
(svn_wc_crawl_revisions): If the target entry is non-existent,
report the target as missing.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(check_wc_root):  Handle the case when a path is unversioned rather
than erroring.  Treat all unversioned paths as svn_node_file so
that the anchor will be the parent directory when possible.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/update_tests.py
(update_to_future_add): New test that updates a single file and
directory which were added in a future revision.

author: breser
msg: Try putting the Solaris logo on the right line.
* www/project_packages.html
Put Solaris logo in the right place.
